bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Illness Sign of a dazed and unwell feeling in the head, with a lack of mental alertness. In severe cases this is associated with unstable walking. Tai ping sheng hui fang 太平聖惠方 30: 治虛勞乏弱 , 四肢無力 , 頭昏目暗 , 身體疼痛 , 不欲吃食 , 宜服羚羊角丸方 , “To cure depletion with exhaustion to fatigue and weakness, with the four extremities lacking strength, clouded head with dim vision, with the body feeling pain all over, and a lack of appetite, the recipe to ingest the pills with ling yang jiao is advisable”.
